name: Gmail Notes Enhanced
description: cloudHQ create great addons for Gmail. I try to make them pretty.
additional_info:
• Changed: the background color and border color for the general edit field,
  • Added: a Cancel button (instead of a Cancel link),
  • Added: the word 'Note' before a note,
  • Changed: the background of a general note,
  • Added: Edit and Delete buttons (instead of links),
  • Changed: the icon plus colour for 'inline notes disabled',
  • Changed: the icon plus colour for 'inline notes enabled',
  • Changed: border of the mail body in inline notes mode,
  • Changed: background of the text that has an inline note attached,
  • Added/Changed: a yellow note icon that is displayed in your Gmail mail list to make mails with notes more notable.
